column5: looking to find someone to go kayak fishing this up coming season i dont drive but willing to pay gas and i get 50 percent off at all provincial parks for camping i am retired and no family so am available all the time lol i do a lot of kayak fishing in frenchmans bay since i can get there on my own i live about 5 minutes from the toronto zooopen for day trips to week trips maybe hit a couple of the kayak tourneysfavorite fish are bass pike panfish catfish but will fish for anything ( i also hunt ) i am an all day type fisherman as they say a bad day fishing is better than a ........ wait no such thing as a bad day fishing lolrob
good luck hope you find someone to fish with. Always nice to have someone along, each of you can try different methods see what the fish want
Good luck Rob. My paddling days are over now. Great to see a fellow retiree still can, especially if that is a special chair in your photo.

Let's go fishing. I have a tandem but end up fishing alone often. I fished scugog, simcoe, credit, rouge, frenchmans, lake wilcox. Would prefer to go with someone because it is much safer.  Sleepjigging

Let's go fishing. I have a tandem but end up fishing alone often. I fished scugog, simcoe, credit, rouge, frenchmans, lake wilcox. Would prefer to go with someone because it is much safer.  Sleepjigging any time any where i have  kayak and travel lol ya i usually go alone and have dumped once was sketchy lol and besides always good to have a witness lol
Im down for netflix and chill???

yes its a mobility scooter i can walk just not for very long it gets very painful and as far as paddling goes i usually dont go too far and next month i am adding a trolling motor  Good luck Rob. My paddling days are over now. Great to see a fellow retiree still can, especially if that is a special chair in your photo.
If your ever up to some fishing on the Trent River just say the word..I have a boat and always looking to fish with a new friend...
the trent is pretty long where abouts are you  If your ever up to some fishing on the Trent River just say the word..I have a boat and always looking to fish with a new friend...
the trent is pretty long where abouts are you  right below lake seymore in crowe bay. Trent Hills

yes its a mobility scooter i can walk just not for very long it gets very painful and as far as paddling goes i usually dont go too far and next month i am adding a trolling motor   right below lake seymore in crowe bay. Trent Hills  Hope this works out for you. Caught an unexpected decent musky on Lake Seymour years ago. But alas, now i am wheelchair bound. Get out if you can. Good Luck!
